name: The Beach (Yonish)
description:
The Beach was created for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) jam.

The Beach takes you on the stroll along an infinitely long beach, where you can grab some sticks, maybe place some things around, and maybe find messages. And maybe send some to the ether as well.

In the perfect world (which might still happen) the messages would be sent to and received from a server, but I didn't got that far in the time given. But there are still a few nice messages in there.
